name: Shapeshifting Bundle
description: Handles shapeshifted animal mimicry, behavior, and suppression.

entity_action.command: execute as @e[type=!player, distance=..30] run team join Mob

action.command: give @p leather{display:{Name:'{"text":"Axolotl Skin","color":"red"}',Lore:['{"text":"The fresh skin of an Axolotl. No matter the age, it just never seems to decay.","italic":true}']}} 1

item_condition.nbt: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Fawn Skin","color":"red","italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"It writhes...","color":"red","italic":true}','{"text":"... The skin clings to you..","color":"red","italic":true}','{"text":" It want to be one with you.","color":"red","bold":true,"italic":true}']}}
